message:
Editor refreshed UI (#189)

* Current annotation view

* Userpics and tooltips

* Sidebar tabs toggle

* Updated layout

* Selected entity styles

* Allow providing panels from outside of LSF

* React component

* Fix webpack build

* Fix LSF init process

* Properly register panels

* Fix constructor

* Trace

* Rename library

* Fix width

* Setup interfaces

* Remove accidental import

* Controls and tabs

* Fix controls grid

* Fix ID display

* Main BG color

* Offer a method to destroy LSF

* Update React and ReactDOM to 17.0.2

* Fix destroy method

* Rollback React (Konva incompatibilities)

* React 16.14.0

* Pass an empty task if none was provided

* Fix border lines

* Fix component

* Allow updating the task

* Component init

* Disable new react-jsx

* Revert "Disable new react-jsx"

This reverts commit 94b42e761434c80dd44b4f992ac7162706dedff4.

* Fix review interface

* Accept/reject annotations

* Update React and Konva

* Fine-tune accept/reject

* Add `src` to npm package

* Rename SidebarToggle => SidebarTabs, fix layout

* Support "Delete annotation" interface

* Labels padding, customizable sticky offset

* Allow passing users to the annotations

* Annotation history WIP

* Add interface for annotation history

* Support annotation history

* Pass annotationHistory to every underlying component

* View all

* Remove unnecessary logs

* Add store initialized event

* Call onStorageInitialized only once per instance

* Fix initialized state

* Filter

* Use fixed result instead of previous

* Display acceptance state on history items

* Add optional infobar with task ID

* Display infobox with validation errors

* Add 'view-all' interface

* Settings button

* Fix layout and colors

* Fix padding

* Fix tooltips

* Fix annotations overflow issue

* Fixing tests

* Add html to the build

* Properly display predictions

* Fix region item padding

* Style and typo fixes

* Fix tabs list

* Fix View All

* Tiny fixes and console.log removal

* Allow copying anno/predictions

* Allow copying only saved annotations

* Episode VI: Return of the Draft

- DraftPanel with status and toggle
- draftId for backend integration
- fix draft status changing

* Small tuning: "*" for draft; " " for node

* Fix View All styles (width)

* Last View All styles fix

* Fix "Create Copy" button

* Drop draft info only after api requests

* Isolate MobX global state

* Update caniuse db

* Remove console.log

* Show every history item

* Fix tests

* Fix tests 2

* Disable buttons when history item is selected

* Hide regions and stuff when there's no segmentation (labels) tag

* Review history divider

* Fix tests

* Fix tests (vol. 2)

Co-authored-by: hlomzik <hlomzik@gmail.com>
